text: @PressSec @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @POTUS FAKE NEWS!! Zero risk to jobs or for coronavirus from immigrants...this is about taking advantage of a crises to cynically advance non-essential policy items designed exclusively for political reasons. @realDonaldTrump needs to focus 100% on catching up on testing - SAD!!
